Module com.example.demo
Package com.example.demo.Level2.EnemyLevelTwo

Class Boss

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.image.ImageView
com.example.demo.LevelCommonElements.Actor.ActiveActor
com.example.demo.LevelCommonElements.Actor.ActiveActorDestructible
com.example.demo.LevelCommonElements.Actor.FighterPlane
com.example.demo.Level2.EnemyLevelTwo.Boss
All Implemented Interfaces:
Destructible, javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class Boss extends FighterPlane
Represents the Boss enemy in Level 2 of the game. The Boss controls movement patterns, shield activation, projectile firing, and damage-taking mechanics. It is a subclass of FighterPlane.

  • Property Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • Boss

      public Boss(LevelViewLevelTwo levelView)
      Constructs a Boss instance with the specified level view.
      Parameters:
      levelView - The level view that will be used to update the shield's position.

  • Method Details

    • updatePosition

      public void updatePosition()
      Updates the position of the Boss. The Boss moves vertically based on the current move pattern, and its shield position is updated accordingly.
      Specified by:
      updatePosition in class ActiveActorDestructible

    • updateActor

      public void updateActor()
      Updates the Boss's state, including its position and shield status.
      Specified by:
      updateActor in class ActiveActorDestructible

    • fireProjectile

      public ActiveActorDestructible fireProjectile()
      Fires a projectile if the Boss fires in the current frame.
      Specified by:
      fireProjectile in class FighterPlane
      Returns:
      A new BossProjectile instance if the Boss fires, or null if it does not.

    • takeDamage

      public void takeDamage()
      Handles damage taken by the Boss. If the Boss is shielded, it does not take damage.
      Specified by:
      takeDamage in interface Destructible
      Overrides:
      takeDamage in class FighterPlane

    • initializeMovePattern

      private void initializeMovePattern()
      Initializes the movement pattern of the Boss, which is a random sequence of vertical movements.

    • updateShield

      private void updateShield()
      Updates the shield status. The shield is activated if necessary and deactivated when exhausted.

    • updateShieldPosition

      private void updateShieldPosition()
      Updates the position of the shield relative to the Boss's position.

    • getNextMove

      private int getNextMove()
      Retrieves the next move for the Boss from the movement pattern. The Boss moves according to the shuffled move pattern, and the sequence is reset after a number of moves.
      Returns:
      The next vertical move for the Boss.

    • bossFiresInCurrentFrame

      private boolean bossFiresInCurrentFrame()
      Determines if the Boss should fire a projectile in the current frame.
      Returns:
      True if the Boss fires in the current frame, false otherwise.

    • getProjectileInitialPosition

      private double getProjectileInitialPosition()
      Retrieves the initial Y position for the projectile fired by the Boss.
      Returns:
      The initial Y position for the Boss's projectile.

    • shieldShouldBeActivated

      private boolean shieldShouldBeActivated()
      Determines if the Boss's shield should be activated based on a random probability.
      Returns:
      True if the shield should be activated, false otherwise.

    • shieldExhausted

      private boolean shieldExhausted()
      Determines if the Boss's shield has been active for the maximum number of frames.
      Returns:
      True if the shield is exhausted, false otherwise.

    • activateShield

      private void activateShield()
      Activates the Boss's shield, resetting the frame count and updating the level view.

    • deactivateShield

      private void deactivateShield()
      Deactivates the Boss's shield and updates the level view.
